body.p: On 1 January 20X0, Entity A issued a 10 per cent convertible debenture with a face value of CU1,000 maturing on 31 December 20X9. The debenture is convertible into ordinary shares of Entity A at a conversion price of CU25 per share. Interest is payable half‑yearly in cash. At the date of issue, Entity A could have issued non‑convertible debt with a ten‑year term bearing a coupon interest rate of 11 per cent.
